title: Analysis from sawtooth graph of derivative part - b

content.description: The figure above shows the graph of the piecewise-linear function f. For −4 ≤ x ≤ 12, the function g is defined by g(x)=∫2xf(t)dt
content.question: Does the graph of g have a point of inflection at x = 4 ? Justify your answer.

frqParts.text: Does the graph of g have a point of inflection at x = 4 ? Justify your answer.

topic.text: 5.6: Determining Concavity of Functions over Their Domains

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
